page.title: 05The McNeill Family.
page.content: Julie and Martin McNeill have three children - Donna, Kerry and baby John. Julie is a housewife, and even though she finds this work dull, she is happy to do it for her family. She also helps, regularly, at the Infants' School. Martin works for an engineering firm. He is now installing a new heating system at a Cirencester hospital. The McNeills do not often go on holiday, but they like going to France or Spain whenever possible. Julie plays skittles with "Concorde" (a local team) and loves gardening. Martin likes to mend the car occasionally. Sometimes, they play Scrabble or Monopoly with the children. Donna, the eldest child, likes playing music, and gymnastics. They all like Tuffley very much.
